om.tnavigator.request.authorship
Class StandardAuthorshipConfirmationRequestHandling

java.lang.Object
  om.tnavigator.request.authorship.StandardAuthorshipConfirmationRequestHandling
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, PreProcessingRequestHandler, RequestHandler, AuthorshipConfirmationRequestHandler, GracefulFinalization
public class StandardAuthorshipConfirmationRequestHandling
extends java.lang.Object
implements AuthorshipConfirmationRequestHandler

Basic implementation of request handling for the Authorship confirmation required for certain Accessed tests.

Author:
Trevor Hinson
See Also:

                                                           UserSession userSession)
                                                    throws RequestHandlingException
Description copied from interface: PreProcessingRequestHandler
This is used to take anything that is needed from the argument objects in order to form the RequestAssociates visitor that is passed to the implementing RequestHandler at run time. For example, if the implementation of this interface needs certain things to work then they can be extracted from the main objects here.

Specified by:
generateRequiredRequestAssociates in interface PreProcessingRequestHandler
Returns:
Throws:
RequestHandlingException

public RequestResponse handle(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                              javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response,
                              RequestAssociates associates)
                       throws RequestHandlingException
Description copied from interface: RequestHandler
Delegated to in order to handle HTTP requests. Different implementations of this interface can be decided upon which to use from within the controller (Servlet) based on the request itself. We could abstract that decision further from the Servlet also but that has been left at this time.

Specified by:
handle in interface RequestHandler

Throws:

shouldRun

protected boolean shouldRun(RequestAssociates associates)
                     throws RequestHandlingException
Here we check that the test meets the criteria for running this RequestHandler. In this instance we identify if the TestDeployment specifies that the test is Accessed and therefore we need to run.

userSpecifiedCancelToQuestion

protected boolean userSpecifiedCancelToQuestion(RequestAssociates ra)
Here we simply check to see if the user has actually selected one of the options presented or not. If nothing is specified then we say the user has specified Cancel to the question.

close

public FinalizedResponse close(java.lang.Object o)
                        throws UtilityException
Description copied from interface: GracefulFinalization
Simple template for the closing of resources within given implementations this method should then be invoked before disposal of the implementor. Where waiting for the finalize method on an implementor is either not sufficient or valid / appropriate. Ensure to invoke the implementation at teh appropriate point also !

Specified by:
close in interface GracefulFinalization
Returns:
Throws:
UtilityException
